StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetOCSViewByClassForDistrict]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Class varchar(8), @FY int, @ClassNumber int, @OrgId int, @SortExpression nvarchar(100) = 'ScheduledShipDate' AS
DECLARE @ClassID int DECLARE @OrgType varchar(5)
--- GET THE CLASS ID SELECT @ClassID = CLASS_ID FROM [dbo].[OCS_CLASS] WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE TRAINING_TYPE_CODE = @Class AND CLASS_NUMBER = @ClassNumber AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FY
select @OrgType = ORGANIZATION_TYPE from dbo.RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION ro where ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgId
SELECT oss INTO #OrgList FROM [MCRISS].[USMC].[vwRecrui.ngOrgIDs] orgIds WHERE (CASE @OrgType WHEN 'H' THEN orgIds.HQ WHEN 'R' THEN orgIds.Region WHEN 'D' THEN orgIds.District WHEN 'RS' THEN orgIds.RS WHEN 'OSS' THEN orgIds.OSS END = @OrgId) AND oss IS NOT NULL
SELECT P.PERSON_ID, N.NWA_ID, C.CONTRACT_ID, dbo.OCS.OCS_ID, P.LAST_NAME + ', ' + P.FIRST_NAME + COALESCE(SPACE(1) + P.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME, SPACE(0)) AS PERSON_NAME, P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER AS SSN, MC.GENDER_CODE AS GENDER, OCS.SCHEDULED_SHIP_DATE, @Class AS TRAINING_TYPE, @ClassNumber AS CLASS_INCREMENT, OCS.REPORT_DATE, OCS.COMPANY, OCS.PLATOON, COALESCE(OCR.RESULT_DESCRIPTION, SPACE(0)) AS TRAINING_RESULT, OCS.DROP_REASON AS DROP_CODE, ODR.DROP_REASON_DESCRIPTION AS DROP_REASON, COALESCE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(2), OCS.TRAINING_DROP_WEEK), SPACE(0)) AS TRAINING_DROP_WEEK, SD.STATUS_DESCRIPTION, SD.DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION, OSS.ORGANIZATION_ID, OSS.SHORT_NAME AS ORGANIZATION_NAME, OSS.ORGANIZATION_TYPE FROM [dbo].[NWA] N INNER JOIN [dbo].[RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION] OSS ON N.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = OSS.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN [dbo].[OCS] ON (N.NWA_ID = dbo.OCS.NWA_ID AND dbo.OCS.OCS_ID = USMC.GetMaxOCSID(dbo.OCS.NWA_ID, 'Y') AND dbo.OCS.OCS_CLASS_ID = @ClassID) INNER JOIN [dbo].[PERSON] P ON N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = P.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN [dbo].[MARINE_CANDIDATE] MC ON P.PERSON_ID = MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INNER JOIN [dbo].[CANDIDATE_STATUS] CS ON (N.NWA_ID = CS.NWA_ID AND CS.STATUS_TYPE = 'O' AND CS.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID = USMC.GetMaxStatusID(CS.NWA_ID)) INNER JOIN [dbo].[STATUS_DISPOSITION] SD ON (CS.STATUS_TYPE = SD.STATUS_TYPE AND CS.STATUS_CODE = SD.STATUS_CODE AND CS.DISPOSITION_CODE = SD.DISPOSITION_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[OFFICER_CONTRACT] C ON dbo.OCS.NWA_ID = C.NWA_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[OCS_DROP_REASON] ODR ON dbo.OCS.DROP_REASON = ODR.DROP_REASON_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[OCS_CLASS_RESULT] OCR ON dbo.OCS.CLASS_RESULT_CODE = OCR.RESULT_CODE INNER JOIN #OrgList ol ON ol.oss = N.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID ORDER BY CASE WHEN @SortExpression='PersonName' THEN P.LAST_NAME + ', ' + P.FIRST_NAME END ASC, CASE WHEN @SortExpression='PersonName DESC' THEN P.LAST_NAME + ', ' + P.FIRST_NAME END DESC, CASE WHEN @SortExpression='ScheduledShipDate' THEN dbo.OCS.SCHEDULED_SHIP_DATE END ASC, CASE WHEN @SortExpression='ScheduledShipDate DESC' THEN dbo.OCS.SCHEDULED_SHIP_DATE END DESC, CASE WHEN @SortExpression='ReportDate' THEN dbo.OCS.REPORT_DATE END ASC, CASE WHEN @SortExpression='ReportDate DESC' THEN dbo.OCS.REPORT_DATE END DESC, CASE WHEN @SortExpression='TrainingResult' THEN OCR.RESULT_DESCRIPTION END ASC, CASE WHEN @SortExpression='TrainingResult DESC' THEN OCR.RESULT_DESCRIPTION END DESC, CASE WHEN @SortExpression='OrgName' THEN OSS.SHORT_NAME END ASC, CASE WHEN @SortExpression='OrgName DESC' THEN OSS.SHORT_NAME END DESC
DROP TABLE #OrgList
